question_id: Di antara film 'PG-13', tampilkan yang biaya sewanya lebih tinggi dari rata-rata biaya sewa film 'PG-13' **dengan durasi > 120 menit** di kategori yang sama; sertakan judul, kategori, dan rental_rate.
sql_query:
SELECT
    f.title AS judul_film,
    c.name AS kategori_film,
    f.rental_rate AS biaya_sewa
FROM
    film f
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category c ON fc.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE
    f.rating = 'PG-13'
    AND f.rental_duration > 120
    AND c.name IN (SELECT name FROM category WHERE name LIKE '%PG-13%')
ORDER BY
     biaya_sewa
LIMIT 1
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    f.title AS judul_film,
    c.name AS kategori_film,
    f.rental_rate AS biaya_sewa
FROM
    film f
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category c ON fc.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE
    f.rating = 'PG-13'
    AND f.rental_duration > 120
    AND c.name IN (SELECT name FROM category WHERE name LIKE '%PG-13%')
ORDER BY
     biaya_sewa
LIMIT 1;
```
